message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Given its significance, I understand it might also be highly sought after by you, valued at $1,200,000. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose to offer this exceptional product to you at a price of $1,350,000. This offer is tailored to reflect its true worth while providing you with a significant advantage over potential competitors. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a deal that meets both our expectations.
